Description: Fragment of upper part of black-figure painted pottery situla. Design black on buff ground, with incised lines. Lion or panther, branches in field. Purple on neck of animal.
Bibliographic references: Vase / Catalogue of Vases in the British Museum (B106.18)
CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 604, 2 (and Pl. GB 597, 9)) (Group C12)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 252)
